title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง 402.16 - Licensee's privacy policy
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง 402.16 - Licensee's privacy policy

State Regulations

Each licensee shall comply with the privacy provisions
contained in title 5 of the Gramm- Leach-Bliley Act of 1999, which is found in
15 United States Code [FN*] section 6801 et seq., and the regulations
promulgated thereunder by the Federal Trade Commission, which are found in
title 16, Code of Federal Regulations,* part 313 et seq. [FN*] For information regarding the United States Code (USC
or U.S.C.), the Code of Federal Regulations (CFR) and the Federal Register, see

Supervisory Policy G 1. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3
ยง
402.16

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
